name: FNF: Boyfriend Test PICO-8 Remake
description:
A remake of the Boyfriend Test by ShanSun (https://shansun.itch.io/fnfboyfriendtest) for the PICO-8, a fantasy console developed by Lexaloffle Games where the sky's the limit when it comes to the creation of tiny games.

Up = Slightly higher pitched aaa

Down = Slightly lower pitched aaa

Left = Aaa

Right= Same as left (Aaa)
